title: Once Owned by Demi Moore, Penthouse in High-Profile New York Building Seeks $50 Million
text:
In one of Manhattan’s best-known buildings, a triplex penthouse that was at one point owned by actress Demi Moore, and prior to her by Bee Gees manager Robert Stigwood, is coming on the market for $50 million, according to its listing agent.

The unit is in one of two beaux-arts towers at the iconic San Remo building on the Upper West Side. The neighboring penthouse in the north tower is owned by U2 frontman Bono, who bought it from Apple founder Steve Jobs in 2003 for around $14.5 million, according to people familiar with...
description: In the San Remo, the unit neighbors one owned by U2 frontman Bono, who bought it from Apple founder Steve Jobs in 2003.
